name: BladderCancerStagingT1ForUrologyCare
title: Bladder Cancer staging T1 for Urology Care
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The staging is for the primary Tumor (T) as related to bladder cancer.  This is a tumor that invades the subepithelial connective tissue.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a T1 bladder cancer which is nonmuscle invasive.),(Inclusion Criteria: T1 nonmuscle invasive bladder cancer.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any Primary Tumor (T) stage other than T1)

concept.display: T1: Tumor invades lamina propria or submucosa (finding)
